title: ‘Offense is the Best Defense’: Pidcock Unleashes Brutal Solo Attack to Tighten Grip on AlUla Tour GC
content:
Pidcock fends off four chasers to win the second time this week and close in on his first career GC stage race victory in high-pressure debut with Q36.5.

Read the full article at ‘Offense is the Best Defense’: Pidcock Unleashes Brutal Solo Attack to Tighten Grip on AlUla Tour GC on Velo.
